351.Name: Wanderer's Trail
351.Desc: The god took away your only kin, and you were sealed and cast into a deep slumber. Upon your awakening, you wandered alone for a time until you met a strange companion named Paimon, thus beginning your journey through the continent of Teyvat...

Stages.6: Go to the foot of the cliff
Stages.8: Climb to the top of the rock face

352.Name: Bird's Eye View
352.Desc: You begin your journey in Starfell Valley, exploring the land and seeing its sights together with Paimon.

Stages.5: Swim to the island in Starfell Lake

353.Name: Unexpected Power
353.Desc: As you advanced, a Statue of the Seven appeared on the horizon ahead of you. At Paimon's suggestion, you go to investigate.

355.Name: Forest Rendezvous
355.Desc: Unexpectedly, the power of Anemo within the Statue of the Seven resonated with you. You decided to begin your investigation with the Anemo Archon of Teyvat's Seven Archons. As such, the first order of the day is to reach the land under the Anemo Archon's protection: Mondstadt.

Stages.2: Advance to the heart of the forest

354.Name: Wind-Riding Knight
354.Desc: On the path to Mondstadt, you inadvertently eavesdropped on a meeting between a huge dragon and a mysterious figure. As you proceeded with various doubts in mind, a perky young girl showed up to block your path.

Stages.3: Use Amber to defeat the airborne slimes
Stages.4: Expose hidden trigger to start driving
Stages.5: Go to the location designated by Amber

360.Name: Going Upon the Breeze
360.Desc: The girl's name is Amber, and her duty as an Outrider is to escort you to Mondstadt. However, she has another task to attend to first, which is to clean out the hilichurls that have been wandering around outside the city.

Stages.3: Clear out the nearby hilichurl camp

356.Name: City of Freedom
356.Desc: With your help, the problem was resolved quickly. Led by Amber, you reach the city of freedom — Mondstadt.

Stages.3: Go to the location designated by Amber
Stages.6: Meet Amber at the fountain plaza

357.Name: Dragon Storm
357.Desc: The usually peaceful Mondstadt was suddenly assailed by a dragon. This is the Stormterror that Amber spoke of, and was the gigantic creature that you encountered in the forest earlier.

Stages.5: Go to the Knights of Favonius Headquarters

358.Name: Knights of Favonius
358.Desc: You repelled Stormterror with some difficulty. Kaeya of the Knights of Favonius witnessed the battle, and you were invited to make a trip to the Knights headquarters.

Stages.2: Enter the Knights of Favonius Headquarters

306.Name: Winds of the Past
306.Desc: To stop Stormterror's siege, you must venture out and eliminate the elemental flows left within the ruined Temples of the Four Winds. Amber is waiting for you at the Temple of the Falcon.

307.Name: Crash Course
307.Desc: Kaeya will accompany you to explore the Temple of the Wolf.

308.Name: Sparks Amongst the Pages
308.Desc: Lisa is in charge of clearing the Temple of the Lion alongside you.

311.Name: First Stage Ended
311.Desc: After completing the first stage, talk to Paimon for a hidden quest

370.Name: Shadow Over Mondstadt
370.Desc: Thanks to your efforts, Mondstadt's elemental flow has returned to normal. It's time to report back to Jean.

Stages.2: Listen to Jean's conversation with the strange person
Stages.3: Return to the Knights of Favonius Headquarters with Jean

371.Name: Unexpected Encounter
371.Desc: Returning to Mondstadt, you encountered a clash between Jean and the Fatui. Afterward, you showed Jean the dragon tear that you found in the forest, and at her request, once again joined the investigation into Stormterror Dvalin.

Stages.1: Leave the Knights of Favonius Headquarters
Stages.5: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.6: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.7: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.8: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.9: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.10: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.11: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.12: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight
Stages.13: Look for the suspicious person using Elemental Sight

372.Name: That Green Fellow
372.Desc: As you were heading out to investigate, you happened upon the mysterious guy that you saw talking to the dragon.

373.Name: Let the Wind Lead
373.Desc: The mysterious fellow claimed to be a bard named Venti, but left on his own accord before you could get him to explain his relationship with the dragon. You follow him to the giant tree at Windrise.

374.Name: Venti's Plan
374.Desc: Stopped at last, Venti explained that he had tried and failed to cleanse Dvalin's curse during their previous meeting. Now, he has been forced to rely on the Holy Lyre der Himmel's power if he is to restore Dvalin.

Stages.2: Go to the Cathedral with Venti
Stages.4: See how Venti borrows the Holy Lyre

375.Name: Venti's New Plan
375.Desc: Venti's plan to sweet talk his way into getting the Holy Lyre back backfires. He's come up with a new plan, but seems he'll need your help for it to work.

Stages.3: Infiltrate the basement and obtain the Holy Lyre der Himmel

376.Name: Wild Escape
376.Desc: Venti's plan to steal the Holy Lyre went off without a hitch. Well, almost — when the Lyre was almost in your hands, a stranger stole it from under your noses. Your movements alerted the guards, forcing you to flee the Cathedral.

Stages.2: Use the wind currents to get far away from the Cathedral
Stages.6: Hide on the second floor of the tavern

377.Name: Behind the Scenes
377.Desc: In your haste fleeing from the confusion, you found yourself in Diluc's tavern, where — to your surprise — he decided to help hide you. Diluc agrees to meet back at the tavern after nightfall with his "contacts" — who could they be?

Stages.2: Return to the tavern the following night
Stages.3: Wait till the tavern is closed (00:00 – 6:00)

20101.Name: Chasing Shadows
20101.Desc: The person Diluc called in turned out to be Jean from the Knights of Favonius. After some discussions, it is discovered that it was the Fatui who stole the Holy Lyre der Himmel. You must retrieve it to rescue Dvalin.

Stages.4: Stage callback on door open. Key destroyed.
Stages.6: Talk to the NPC in room 1
Stages.12: Negotiation with NPC fell apart - trigger before combat
Stages.13: Negotiation with NPC failed - combat loop
Stages.15: Room 1 - quest pin for obtaining key through negotiations
Stages.16: Room 1 - quest pin for obtaining key through combat
Stages.23: Talk to the NPC in room 2
Stages.29: Negotiation with NPC 2 fell apart - trigger before combat
Stages.30: Negotiation with NPC 2 failed - combat loop
Stages.32: Room 2 - quest pin for obtaining key through negotiations
Stages.33: Room 2 - quest pin for obtaining key through combat
Stages.38: Talk to the NPC in room 3
Stages.44: Negotiation with NPC 3 fell apart - trigger before combat
Stages.45: Negotiation with NPC 3 failed — combat loop
Stages.47: Room 3 - quest pin for obtaining key through negotiations
Stages.48: Room 3 - quest pin for obtaining key through combat
Stages.50: Room 4 — combat loop and pin quest
Stages.52: Room 5 — combat loop and pin quest
Stages.54: Room 5 — combat loop and pin quest
Stages.56: Scour the Fatui hideout to find the key
Stages.58: Enter the area where the lyre is stored
Stages.59: Obtain the Holy Lyre der Himmel

379.Name: State of the Holy Lyre der Himmel
379.Desc: After a fierce battle, you managed to seize the Holy Lyre der Himmel back from the hands of the Fatui. For some reason, Venti seems to express a great nostalgia for the Lyre...

Stages.1: Bring the Holy Lyre back to the tavern
Stages.3: Use Dvalin's Teardrop Crystal on the Holy Lyre

385.Name: Let's go on an Adventure
385.Desc: The Adventurers' Guild can give you Adventure Reports on the area surrounding Mondstadt. All reports are free!

380.Name: Fallen Tears
380.Desc: The Holy Lyre is in poor condition, but you manage to restore some of its Anemo power by using Dvalin's tears. To restore its full power, you will need to look for more tears.

Stages.1: Go to the Thousand Winds Temple
Stages.2: Defeat the monsters guarding the ruin to complete the challenge

381.Name: Hidden Tears
381.Desc: Dvalin's footprints are all over Mondstadt, and one of his tears fell upon a ruin deep within the forest.

Stages.1: Go to the ruins in the woods
Stages.2: Enter the ruins in the woods
Stages.3: Defeat all opponents in the ruin

382.Name: Stolen Tears
382.Desc: The corrupted dragon tear has even attracted hilichurls. You must get it back from them.

Stages.1: Go to the Eclipse Tribe at Dadaupa Gorge
Stages.2: Open the chest to obtain Dvalin's Tear

383.Name: Crystal Tears
383.Desc: After completing the retrieval of the tears, you meet up with the rest of the group.

Stages.3: Use Dvalin's Tear on the Holy Lyre

384.Name: Reunion with the Dragon
384.Desc: Dvalin's tears restored the Holy Lyre back to its full power. Now, you are finally ready to purify Stormterror.

397.Name: Abyss Mage
397.Desc: You used the Holy Lyre der Himmel to summon Stormterror, only to be prevented from saving it due to the interference of the Abyss Order. But you haven't given up yet — and Diluc has been able to swiftly obtain a new lead...

388.Name: Hurdle
388.Desc: You came to Stormterror's Lair to once again attempt Dvalin's rescue. However, it is surrounded by wind barriers made by Stormterror, and the dark forces at work have no intention of letting you break through those barriers so easily.

Stages.1: Go to the entrance of Stormterror's Lair

389.Name: Empty Abode
389.Desc: Assailed by many enemies, you realize that this road will not be an easy one. The way into Stormterror's Lair is strewn with obstacles, and so you must proceed with caution to find a path along the ruined walls.

Stages.5: Find a way through the wind barrier
Stages.7: Look for a way to the top of the tower
Stages.9: Go towards the top of the tower

390.Name: Light Guiding Ceremony
390.Desc: The entrance to Stormterror's Lair is just ahead, but the light seals bar the way in. You must once again face a trial in order to break those seals.

Stages.1: Investigate the seal at the top of the tower
Stages.3: Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair
Stages.4: Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair
Stages.5: Break the seal in Stormterror's Lair
Stages.6: Investigate all of the light beams

393.Name: Calm Before the Storm
393.Desc: The three light seals have each been broken by you in their turn, and the path to the decisive showdown is open. You once again return to the lair's entrance to put an end to things.

Stages.1: Activate the seal at the entrance
Stages.2: Go back to the top of the tower

394.Name: A Long Shot
394.Desc: After a long and daring pursuit of Dvalin, who has been led astray by the Abyss Mages, you are about to finally confront him once and for all.

Stages.2: Ride the winds to defeat Dvalin

398.Name: When the Wind Dies Down
398.Desc: You finally managed to save Dvalin. Is this where the story of the wind ends?

396.Name: Ending Note
396.Desc: Amber says that Jean is waiting for you at the Cathedral. Apparently, it's something to do with the Holy Lyre der Himmel...

Stages.2: Meet Jean and Venti at the Cathedral

407.Name: Liyue Game
407.Desc: A mysterious man calling himself the Cricket Referee excitedly invites you to play a game popular with the masses in Liyue.

408.Name: Pontoon Parkour
408.Desc: At Cider Lake, a woman explained her troubles to you.

409.Name: Slime Baskets
409.Desc: An enthusiastic slime breeder invites you to play with them.

418.Name: Break the Sword Cemetery Seal
418.Desc: According to Dr. Livingstone, there are three hilichurl tribes surrounding the Sword Cemetery in <color=00E1FFFF>Dadaupa Gorge**. To the north, the Meaty tribe; to the south, the Sleeper tribe; and in the valley to the east, the Eclipse tribe. The key to breaking the seals on the Sword Cemetery may lie within their encampments...

Stages.3: Obtain the treasure at the center of the Sword Cemetery
Stages.6: Obtain the treasure at the center of the Sword Cemetery

419.Name: Break the Eclipse Tribe's Seal
419.Desc: The Eclipse tribe's Elemental Monument stands at the center of their dilapidated altar. It is being defended by samachurls, mitachurls and Abyss Mages, so it might be best to find a way to pick them off.

420.Name: Break the Sleeper Seal
420.Desc: The Sleeper tribe's power lies beneath a large tree, defended by mitachurls and a heap of hilichurls. Defeating mitachurls will break the seal on the Elemental Monument. It is said that mitachurls sleep early, so surprising them at night might be a good idea.

422.Name: Break the Meaty Seal
422.Desc: The Meaty tribe worships power. Challenge them in the arena to break the seal.

423.Name: Find the Missing Fairy
423.Desc: The fairies were kidnapped by nearby hilichurls, devastating the Tree of Life. If we manage to save the fairies, perhaps the Tree of Life will respond to our prayers.

451.Name: Wolves' Territory
451.Desc: You and Paimon decide to pay a visit to Wolvendom, a place in Mondstadt that few people pass through, without any knowledge of the dangers that may await you within this primordial territory.

Stages.6: Thank the boy for his help
Stages.9: Give three chunks of Raw Meat to Razor

452.Name: Another Day as an Outrider!
452.Desc: On your last legs from being attacked by an enormous slime, you were rescued by a young man named Razor. Razor, who calls a wolf pack family, mentioned a "red one, burny girl." You have your guesses as to who that is...

Stages.1: Find Amber and ask about the boy from Wolvendom
Stages.3: Talk to Amber about the disturbance up ahead

453.Name: Ravaged by Wolves
453.Desc: It seems that the "red, burny girl" was not Amber, as you had thought. But you receive news from Amber about wolf pack attacks in Drunkard Gorge. The wolf pack, the boy, the attacks... things are getting more complicated. This calls for a thorough investigation.

454.Name: Fate's Chosen Lupical
454.Desc: You are yet again led to Wolvendom. Are these Wolfhook seeds solid evidence? Are Razor and his wolf pack really behind the attack? Or are the Wolfhooks indicative of something else?

Stages.3: Check for strange things along the way
Stages.10: Talk to Razor about how to help the injured wolf
Stages.14: Go to the grave of the Wolf of the North
Stages.16: Challenge the Wolf of the North
Stages.17: Talk to Razor and the Wolf of the North

461.Name: Kaeya's Troubles
461.Desc: You bump into Kaeya, whom you first met during Stormterror's attack, at the Knights of Favonius Headquarters.

Stages.3: Talk to Kaeya at the meeting spot
Stages.5: Go to the Adventurers' Guild and listen to their report

462.Name: Mystery of the Arcadian Ruins
462.Desc: According to Kaeya, his pirate grandfather left behind a treasured sword that has been buried in the Lost Arcadian Ruins. To prevent it from falling into the wrong hands, you search high and low for intelligence regarding the ruins.

Stages.1: Meet with the informant at the designated location
Stages.2: Defeat the opponents attacking the informant
Stages.4: Find the location of the buried treasure
Stages.5: Disappears after controlling Paimon to talk
Stages.6: Solve the mystery (Go to Kaeya at the Knights of Favonius HQ for a hint)
Stages.7: Look for the location in the riddle
Stages.8: Find the location of the buried treasure
Stages.9: Solve the mystery (Go to Kaeya at the Knights of Favonius HQ for a hint)
Stages.10: Look for the location in the riddle

463.Name: Kaeya's Gain
463.Desc: After much thinking, you finally solve the riddles contained within the intel you were given. The Lost Arcadian Ruins are now within reach!

Stages.1: Discuss your next step with Paimon
Stages.2: Use the map to find the buried treasure
Stages.4: Enter the depths of the ruin

464.Name: Legend of the Darknight Hero
464.Desc: Recently, rumors about a certain Darknight Hero have been circulating around Mondstadt...

Stages.1: Ask Charles about the recent rumors
Stages.2: Ask the bystanders at the fountain plaza for information
Stages.3: Ask the guards around the city gate for information
Stages.4: Ask the preoccupied girl for information

465.Name: Darknight Hero's Crisis
465.Desc: Your inquiries were slowly bringing the Darknight Hero's identity to light, but just then, you met the man himself. His true identity is Diluc, owner of the Dawn Winery — and his actions have long since attracted the attention of the Knights of Favonius...

Stages.2: Go to the Knights of Favonius Headquarters
Stages.3: Talk to Huffman outside the Knights of Favonius Headquarters
Stages.6: Tell Diluc about the war declaration
Stages.7: Go to the Abyss Order stronghold
Stages.10: Arrive at the depths of the Abyss Order stronghold
Stages.12: Interrogate the Abyss Mage and find out their plan
Stages.13: Use fire to burn the plan out of the Abyss Mage
Stages.22: Plan your next step with Diluc
Stages.23: Go to the Knights of Favonius Headquarters
Stages.24: Talk to Huffman about the Knights' situation

466.Name: Darknight Hero's Alibi
466.Desc: Knight Huffman has informed you that the Abyss Order is plotting against the Darknight Hero. As a precaution, the Knights have decided to monitor the Darknight Hero's actions. You shared this information with Diluc and discussed countermeasures. Having made your preparations, you now lie in wait for both the Knights and the Abyss Order to act.

Stages.4: Collect Mist Flower Corolla from beside the water
Stages.5: Give 4 Mist Flower Corolla to Diluc
Stages.12: Pose as a customer and speak to Diluc
Stages.14: Place the elemental bait near the side gate
Stages.19: Face the Abyss Order head-on at Mondstadt's front gate
Stages.24: Return to the tavern before Huffman

467.Name: The Art of Cooking
467.Desc: On the outskirts of the city of Mondstadt, the adventurer Lynn is currently preparing to make a meal...

Stages.3: Give the Chicken-Mushroom Skewer to Lynn.

468.Name: The Boars are Attacking!
468.Desc: Boars keep attacking the vineyards, and Tunner is getting anxious...

469.Name: The Blessings of The Seven
469.Desc: Paimon suggests you go to a Statue of The Seven.

Stages.1: Go to the Statue of The Seven in Windrise
Stages.2: Offer the Anemoculus to the Statue

470.Name: Scent on the Wind
470.Desc: As you walk through Mondstadt, Paimon is attracted by the aroma of food...

Stages.2: Talk to Paimon before the purchase
Stages.4: Talk to Paimon after the purchase

481.Name: Glide with the Wind
481.Desc: Amber wishes to discuss the matter of how you've been using your wind glider...

480.Name: License to Glide
480.Desc: Amber has specially prepared a gliding exam for you. She has also provided a gliding manual, which she has asked you to read before taking the exam.

Stages.3: Follow the route and fly to the finish line in time
Stages.4: Follow Amber's instructions and take the exam again

Stages.3: Gliding Training at Windrise - Teleportation Ring
Stages.4: Defeat all opponents in the area

427.Name: Mondstadt Glider
427.Desc: As it turned out, the book Amber gave you wasn't a manual, but a fairy tale... After completing the first test out in the wild, you learn that the second test is to take place within the city of Mondstadt itself. Amber is waiting for you there.

Stages.1: Go to the door of Mondstadt Cathedral
Stages.3: Follow the route and fly to the finish line in time
Stages.4: Follow Amber's instructions and take the exam again
Stages.6: Follow the markers to arrive at the finish line in time
Stages.7: Follow the route and fly to the finish line in time
Stages.8: Reach the doors of the Adventurers' Guild

484.Name: They Call Him Raptor
484.Desc: During the exam, you were mistaken for the thief Raptor by Otto, a Knight of Favonius, and were stopped. After clearing the misunderstanding, you volunteer to help arrest Raptor — and so begins the chase.

Stages.3: Look for clues to track Raptor
Stages.5: Look for clues to track Raptor
Stages.7: Look for clues to track Raptor
Stages.12: Collect clues and track Strange Bird
Stages.13: The correct dialogue choice after completing the first analysis (Visible)
Stages.16: The wrong dialogue choice after completing the first analysis (Hidden)
Stages.21: Completed talking to NPCs in Springvale (Hidden)
Stages.22: Completed talking to NPCs in Springvale (Visible)
Stages.23: Investigate the strange sound up ahead
Stages.28: Look for the marks left by Raptor
Stages.29: Look for the marks left by Raptor
Stages.30: Look for the marks left by Raptor
Stages.31: Look for the marks left by Raptor
Stages.32: Look for the marks left by Raptor

485.Name: Outrider Style
485.Desc: During your pursuit, you track Raptor to his hideout. You plunge into its depths without hesitation. Time to bring this criminal to justice.

Stages.9: Track down Raptor and arrest him!
Stages.11: Go to the Cathedral to get your gliding license

486.Name: When the West Wind Arises
486.Desc: Sara from the Good Hunter restaurant appears to have a request for the Knights of Favonius...

Stages.1: Talk to Sara about her problem
Stages.4: Pass the citizens' commissions on to Jean
Stages.9: Return to the Knights of Favonius Headquarters
Stages.11: Find Margaret and ask about the commission
Stages.12: Find Charles and ask about the commission
Stages.13: Find Sara and ask about the commission

487.Name: Margaret's Longing
487.Desc: While Jean is ill from overwork, you've been tasked with handling some citizens' commissions on her behalf. Where has Margaret's pet cat Prince run off to this time?

Stages.2: Find Margaret and ask about her commission
Stages.10: Talk to Margaret to finish your commission.

488.Name: Charles' Troubles
488.Desc: Has Charles managed to get hold of the tax forms he needs?

Stages.1: Find Charles and ask about his commission

489.Name: Sara's Worries
489.Desc: Sara's delivery of ingredients still hasn't arrived, and she's growing more anxious by the minute...

Stages.1: Find Sara and ask about her commission
Stages.2: Collect 3 Sweet Flowers and 3 Fowl each

490.Name: Master's Day Off
490.Desc: Today's commissions are done and dusted. Time to check up on Jean at the Cathedral.

Stages.2: Go to the big "Symbol of Vennessa" tree
Stages.4: Hunt down the Abyss Order enemies
Stages.5: Hunt down the Abyss Order opponents
Stages.8: Hunt down the Abyss Order opponents
Stages.10: Return to Mondstadt and talk to Jean
Stages.14: Go to the second-floor terrace and look for Jean

Stages.1: Return to the cathedral and see how Jean is doing

1000.Name: Rite of Descension
1000.Desc: In the land of Liyue by the sea, a city sits atop the solid bedrock. That city is Liyue Harbor, and it has flourished under the protection of its guardian Morax — also known as "Rex Lapis," the Geo Archon you have been looking for. You could not have arrived at a more fortuitous time, as the annual "Rite of Descension" has just begun. Every year on this day, Rex Lapis graces this land with his prophecy, giving guidance on the economic path Liyue should follow in the coming year.

Stages.12: Pray and make a wish at Yujing Terrace
Stages.13: Pray and make a wish at Yujing Terrace
Stages.15: Pray and make a wish at Yujing Terrace
Stages.17: Join the crowd and wait for the rite to begin
Stages.26: Talk to Childe at the Northland Bank

1002.Name: An Impromptu Change of Plan
1002.Desc: During the rite, the appointed moment arrived. Yet when the clouds parted, a divine carcass crashed down to earth, knocking all the offerings over. Amid the chaos and confusion, the Qixing ordered that the assassin be arrested. Unable to prove your innocence, you were forced to accept the help of Childe of the Fatui, and as suggested by him, you are now headed for Jueyun Karst, a hidden abode where the adepti dwell...

Stages.1: Meet the adepti in Jueyun Karst
Stages.4: Fight with support from the adepti

1003.Name: Wangshu
1003.Desc: You came across an adeptus, "Moon Carver." Seeing the keepsake you bore, he lent you his aid and protected you from the Millelith soldiers pursuing you. Upon learning of Rex Lapis' passing and the unjust accusations laid against you, Moon Carver expressed disdain for the Qixing's actions and began to suspect that they were behind what happened. He has sent you to find several other adepti and deliver a message to them.

Stages.6: Ask the boss lady about Xiao
Stages.11: Tell Smiley Yanxiao about what happened
Stages.14: Find a place where you can see the whole Witness Sigil
Stages.19: Tell Smiley Yanxiao about what happened

1008.Name: Moulder of Mountains
1008.Desc: Following the instructions of Moon Carver, you arrive at Mt. Hulao in order to meet with Mountain Shaper.

Stages.5: Shatter the amber on the mountain road to save the trapped person
Stages.7: Talk to Li Ding and Li Dang

1009.Name: Custodian of Clouds
1009.Desc: Following Moon Carver's instructions, you arrive at Mt. Aocang in order to seek out Cloud Retainer.

Stages.3: Look for traces of food offerings
Stages.4: Look for traces of food offerings
Stages.5: Look for traces of food offerings
Stages.10: Offer the Delicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
Stages.11: Offer up food to Cloud Retainer

1018.Name: Dust to Dust
1018.Desc: Having sought out the adepti and completed the task Moon Carver entrusted to you, you return again to Liyue Harbor to look for Childe. He tells you that the Liyue Qixing's response to the archon's passing has given him some food for thought...

Stages.1: Return to Liyue Harbor and find Childe

1010.Name: An Organization Known as Wangsheng
1010.Desc: Upon your return from visiting the Adepti, you discover that the Qixing have hidden the Geo Archon's vessel away. Childe promised he'd find someone to break the stalemate, so you pay another visit to Northland Bank.

1011.Name: Moonfinger
1011.Desc: Childe introduced you to Zhongli, a consultant at Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. You agree to help Zhongli organize the Rite of Parting in the hope of seeing the Geo Archon again.

Stages.3: Look for the Meaty tribe's giant cooking pot
Stages.8: Use Pyro to heat the pot
Stages.12: Use Pyro to heat the pot
Stages.16: Use Pyro to heat the pot
Stages.20: Return to Liyue Harbor and find Shitou
Stages.21: Put the Noctilucous Jade in place

1012.Name: Three Poignant Perfumes
1012.Desc: Zhongli isn't concerned with the deicide itself, but with upholding Liyue's sacred traditions by giving a proper farewell to an archaic lord. Having selected a suitable batch of Noctilucous Jade, your next task is to prepare some perfumes as an offering to the Geo Archon.

Stages.9: Grind the Silk Flowers to extract the essence
Stages.14: Give the Silk Flower Essence to Ying'er
Stages.15: Offer the perfumes to the Statue of the Seven

1014.Name: The Realm Within
1014.Desc: After identifying Rex Lapis' preferred scent, Zhongli sends you to Yujing Terrace to seek out an old friend of his, Madame Ping, and borrow a certain Cleansing Bell. Strange... Zhongli seems to be avoiding his old friend...

Stages.7: Put the perfume and Cleansing Bell in place

1013.Name: Downtown
1013.Desc: Who would have guessed — Madame Ping is an adeptus! After leaving her household, which turned out to be a realm within a teapot, you proceed to Chihu Rock to continue preparations.

Stages.7: Give the Qingxin flower to Tic
Stages.12: Give the Lotus Head to Tac
Stages.17: Give the Iron Chunk to Toe

1015.Name: Guizhong
1015.Desc: You came to renowned purveyor of Liyue herbal medicine, Bubu Pharmacy, to procure some Everlasting Incense. But what started out as a straightforward trip to the pharmacy has turned into a far more complicated affair...

Stages.3: Find the source of the mystery voice
Stages.7: Retrieve spare parts from the military supply post
Stages.13: Find Qiqi back at the Bubu Pharmacy
Stages.14: Put the Everlasting Incense in place

1016.Name: Zhongli's Treat
1016.Desc: That Bubu Pharmacy trip turned into quite an exhilarating ride. (Okay, maybe not that exhilarating.) In yet another remarkable twist, Zhongli has offered to treat you to dinner!

1020.Name: The Floating Palace
1020.Desc: The mysterious emissary Ganyu appeared before you at Third-Round Knockout. Claiming to have come at Ningguang's behest, she invited you to the skyfaring palace known as the Jade Chamber. To that end, you and Paimon have come to Mt. Tianheng, from where you can see the Jade Chamber in the distance.

Stages.2: Search for a way up to the Jade Chamber
Stages.5: Head over to the Guizhong Ballista

1021.Name: Equilibrium

Paimon, however, is preoccupied with another detail that Keqing mentioned: the custom of bringing a greeting gift.

Just as things were coming to a head, you went to the Golden House to intercept Childe as he attempted to seize the Gnosis, only to find yet another twist: The Gnosis was never at the Golden House to begin with. Childe swiftly switched to his backup plan, attempting to force the Geo Archon to make an appearance by summoning an ancient god with Fatui-forged Sigils of Permission...

40001.Name: Towards the Lanterns Origin
40001.Desc: Every year, on the day of the first full moon, the Lantern Rite of Liyue takes place. On that night, everyone in Liyue releases Xiao Lanterns and Mingxiao Lanterns into the bright night sky. Within each of the xiao lanterns, placed a natural levitation stone, and on it hung one's wishful prayer, or a painting depicting one's desire. The lanterns slowly fly away while carrying a hope that the lights emitted by the lanterns might guide the soul of once Liyue's faithful protector, to return and reunite once more. You and Paimon have arrived at this solemn moment of Liyue, preparing for your five-days-long journey...

Stages.5: Go to the construction site of Mingxiao Lanterns

40002.Name: Water Beneath the Lanterns Flows Deep
40002.Desc: The most awaited moment of the Lantern Rite is the time when a giant Mingxiao Lantern released into the sky on the night of the fifth day. And the size of the Mingxiao Lantern this year is a sight that you don't want to miss, as the levitation stone used to make the giant lantern float this year is the biggest in 20 years. On this special occasion, the merchants of Liyue have prepared a Xiao Market, which was built using the same materials as the lanterns. When you arrived at the Xiao Market, the event organizer Huixin asked you for a favor...

Stages.4: Obtain Vermillionite from the Ruin Hunter

40003.Name: In the City of Geo Live the Adepti
40003.Desc: Materials which are used to make lanterns are all easily flammable, and they're piling up at Liyue's port. Between the mountains of materials, you saw a mysterious figure, which shortly got annoyed by your presence and told you off. You and Paimon shared a look and stared at the piles of wood, paper, and oil... You have a bad feeling about this and you went to the Ministry of Civil Affairs to report the situation. Now you're wondering how they're handling the situation, and you've decided to go and see.

Stages.2: Talk to Jiayi at the Ministry of Civil Affairs
Stages.4: Defeat the hilichurls and their roadblock
Stages.5: Talk to the squad of the Millelith

40004.Name: To My Old Friend, Wind Brings My Greetings
40004.Desc: After receiving your help, Millelith is finally able to assign a little group to reinforce their defenses around the city. Unsatisfied with the lack of effort from them, you've come back to the area hoping to find more clues. To your surprise, you met Xiao, a Liyue adeptus who also has the same intention as you. You both discovered that there are some markings at the corners of the construction site. "If a shackle within the realm of deities and demons got loose, I shall take full responsibility." "But this time, the threat comes from the mortal world —— your world, and thus, you shall take full responsibility, mortal traveler." said the adeptus to you. To decipher the markings and to learn its origin, you're reminded of that person that you've met in Mondstadt, a knight who prioritizes results above all else without caring about every trivial law...

Stages.7: Locate the Treasure Thieves using the information
Stages.8: Talk to the member of Treasure Thieves

40005.Name: Lanterns in the Sea
40005.Desc: Through Kaeya's informant, you found out that it's a kind of communication marking used by the Treasure Thieves, a criminal organization spanning across Teyvat. It seems this whole thing is not as serious as you originally thought. The Treasure Thieves in Liyue just received an anonymous letter. Out of fear and respect for Xiao, the Treasure Thieves gave the letter to you. The sender requested that someone of high rank from the Treasure Thieves meet with them secretly in Liyue to discuss an important matter. Once again, out of fear and respect for Xiao, they agreed to let you play as a high ranking official of the Treasure Thieves and meet the mysterious sender.

Stages.1: Meet the sender at the meeting spot

Stages.9: Meet up with the other group

Stages.4: Defeat the opponents and open the chest
Stages.7: Continue using Elemental Sight to search for relics

11022.Name: A Ruin Under Lock and Key
11022.Desc: The expedition to investigate Osial in the Guyun Stone Forest came away with slim pickings. Kliment and Wanyan also clashed vociferously over their differing perspectives, which has greatly displeased the former. During the argument, he heard Wanyan mention the tale of the God of Salt, and decided to take the party there to try their luck, lest he finishes this venture empty-handed.

Stages.4: Look for a spot from which the picture formed by the relics can be seen
Stages.7: Follow Zhongli's instructions and light the monuments up
Stages.9: Go to the site of the broken seal

11023.Name: Farewell, Sweet Salt
11023.Desc: With the aid of Zhongli's knowledge, you are able to undo the seals, but before entering the ruin, he lays a condition before Wanyan and Kliment: to alternate who gets claim to each treasure encountered, with only one object permitted per claim.

Stages.2: Explore the cave and enter the ruins
Stages.3: Explore further and look for divine relics
Stages.14: Talk to Wanyan and witness the truth

11024.Name: A Record of All Things
11024.Desc: Within the ruins, Kliment and Wanyan each betray the contract in turn for personal reasons. As punishment, Kliment is cast out of the ruin and deprived of his reward. Wanyan is made to witness a truth that shatters her beliefs — the God of Salt was gentle but weak and was betrayed and slain as a result. Bearing witness to this incident and filled with conflicted feelings as a result, you follow Zhongli back to Guyun Stone Forest.

Stages.1: Go to Guyun Stone Forest and talk to Zhongli
Stages.2: Consign the relics to the ocean

11030.Name: The Illuminated Beast of the Sea of Clouds
11030.Desc: The three secretaries who originally worked at the Jade Chamber have appeared at Yujing Terrace. It looks like something has them tearing their hair out...

Stages.1: Talk to the Jade Chamber secretaries
Stages.2: Head near Mt. Aocang to look for Ganyu
Stages.4: Head to the site of Ganyu's trial and speak to her
Stages.8: Go to Nantianmen and speak with Xiao

11031.Name: A Secretary in a Sea of Humanity
11031.Desc: Caught between the world of humans and adepti, Ganyu has descended into a funk. After she hits a snag in her plan to return to Jueyun Karst, you follow Ganyu back to Liyue Harbor, intending to resolve her misunderstanding that she has been dismissed from her post...

Stages.1: Accompany Ganyu to return to Liyue Harbor
Stages.5: Head to Yuehai Pavilion and speak to Huixin
Stages.6: Go to the Wanyou Boutique and talk to Bolai
Stages.7: Go to Fanmu Carpenter's and speak with Master Lu
Stages.10: Talk to the suspicious Fatui underling
Stages.11: Clear the warehouse of its occupants
Stages.12: Look for the invoice from Second Life
Stages.13: Return to Yuehai Pavilion and speak to Huixin
Stages.14: Talk to Dongsheng at Second Life

11032.Name: A Pact That Crosses Time
11032.Desc: Accepting the commission of the Tianshu, Uncle Tian, Ganyu very naturally slips into her work mode, coming to the aid of her junior colleague Huixin with ease in the latter's time of need. To express her thanks, Huixin invites you all to Xinyue Kiosk to have a meal...

Stages.1: Go to Xinyue Kiosk for the meal appointment
Stages.5: Talk to the Jade Chamber secretaries
Stages.4: Talk to the Jade Chamber secretaries

11040.Name: The Rumored Alchemist
11040.Desc: You arrive at Timaeus' alchemy store in Mondstadt one day to stock up on adventuring supplies. But here, you encounter someone altogether unexpected...

Stages.2: Speak to the young lady at the store
Stages.3: Head to the entrance of Dragonspine
Stages.4: Get close to the two people talking

11041.Name: The Genius Researcher and the Seed of Another World
11041.Desc: While searching for Albedo, you encounter an odd-looking sister named Rosaria. She claims to know where Albedo is and expresses her willingness to show you the way.

Stages.1: Use your Elemental Sight to follow Albedo's tracks
Stages.2: Use your Elemental Sight to follow Albedo's tracks
Stages.6: Use your Elemental Sight to follow Albedo's tracks
Stages.7: Reach the place where Albedo is
Stages.3: Use your Elemental Sight to follow Albedo's tracks
Stages.4: Use your Elemental Sight to follow Albedo's tracks
Stages.5: Use your Elemental Sight to follow Albedo's tracks

11042.Name: The First Experiment: Elements
11042.Desc: After finding Albedo, Rosaria leaves on her own. You chat with Albedo and discover the objective of his research: to use alchemy to cause a seed from another world to sprout and flourish. To better understand otherworldly lifeforms, Albedo states his desire to observe you and to perform some experiments in the process.

Stages.2: Defeat the slimes to complete the experiment
Stages.3: Talk to Albedo and hear his conclusions
Stages.14: Take the potion from the desk
Stages.17: Talk to Albedo and hear his conclusions
Stages.11: Follow the road and search for a Starsilver Catalyst

11043.Name: The Third Experiment: Life
11043.Desc: After the elemental flow tests, Albedo asks you to display any special, otherworldly abilities you may have, though nothing comes of this. Still, Albedo's interest in you has not waned in the least...

Stages.1: Head to the location of the next experiment
Stages.3: Reach the location that Albedo designated
Stages.5: Talk to Albedo and hear his conclusions

11044.Name: The Second Experiment: The World
11044.Desc: After the experiment begins, Albedo first checks your elemental flow. The result is that both your internal and external elemental flows run smoothly and that there is nothing unusual about them. These results seem very normal indeed, but according to Albedo, this is something to be happy about.

Stages.16: Talk to Albedo and hear his conclusions
Stages.11: Cook some Sunshine Sprat and give it to Albedo
Stages.1: Observe the installations in the camp
Stages.2: Observe the installations in the camp
Stages.3: Observe the installations in the camp
Stages.14: Use Elemental Sight to look for the lost items

11045.Name: The Final Experiment: Withering Glory
11045.Desc: As the experiments proceed, Albedo obtains more and more data related to you, and the alchemy he envisages begins to take shape. Finally, after a simple test of your physical capabilities, the experiments draw to a close...

Stages.1: Head to the location of the intelligence test
Stages.10: Investigate the area behind the drain
Stages.11: Return to the campsite and hear Albedo's conclusions
Stages.8: Return to the center and activate the device

11110.Name: The Mysterious Wangsheng Parlor
11110.Desc: Your adventure takes you to Wuwang Hill, where Paimon senses that something is amiss...

Stages.2: Catch up to the fleeing Meng
Stages.4: Accompany Hu Tao to the Adventurers' Guild
Stages.5: Go back to the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor with Hu Tao
Stages.6: Investigate the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor's surroundings while waiting for Hu Tao
Stages.12: Visit a potential client with Hu Tao
Stages.7: Investigate the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor's surroundings while waiting for Hu Tao
Stages.8: Investigate the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor's surroundings while waiting for Hu Tao

11111.Name: In Pursuit of a Phantom
11111.Desc: When you agreed to help Hu Tao and followed her to the Adventurers' Guild, you hadn't counted on becoming part of Wangsheng Funeral Parlor's "business development" efforts. No topic is too sensitive for Hu Tao — certainly not matters of life and death — and even though some of her points make sense, you find them somewhat difficult to stomach. Then, when you voice your doubts about her approach, she tells you that she has long since moved on from business development to her next objective: finding someone called "Big G."

Stages.1: Talk to Meng at Wangsheng Funeral Parlor and find out what happened
Stages.3: Protect the Ley Line Monolith and fend off the enemies
Stages.4: Listen as Hu Tao tells Luocheng the truth about the exorcism

11112.Name: Friendships, Wishes, and Regrets
11112.Desc: Meng tells you that Big G is his childhood friend, who died by misadventure. Filled with regret and worry, Meng believes that due to a supernatural turn of events, Big G has become an evil spirit. Luocheng, another superstitious person who believes in ghost stories just like Meng, visits the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor seeking an exorcism. However, Hu Tao knows that the source of their worries is imaginary, so she comes up with an equally make-believe solution and organizes a fake exorcism. Surprisingly, the spirit of Big G appears before your eyes after the ritual.

Stages.1: Return to Wangsheng Funeral Parlor and find out what happened
Stages.2: Ask Little Wu for a keepsake
Stages.8: Look for a Plaustrite Shard in the pile of goods
Stages.12: Give the Plaustrite Shard to Congzi
Stages.3: Find Jueyun Chili and give it to Little Wu

11113.Name: Perfect Send-Off
11113.Desc: It turns out that Big G's spirit was attracted by the exorcism. Upon learning that Big G has not become a malevolent spirit and simply wanted to check on Meng and other childhood friends, Hu Tao decides to fulfill his wish and organize a farewell ceremony for him. To give him peace of mind, you collect keepsakes and well-wishes that Big G's childhood friends prepared for him. The only thing left now is to send him off.

Stages.1: Take the keepsakes to Wuwang Hill and give them to Hu Tao
Stages.2: Go the "ordinary place" mentioned by Hu Tao
Stages.5: Follow the path to the border
Stages.6: Continue forward to witness the farewell ceremony
Stages.7: Talk to Hu Tao while the old friends are reminiscing
Stages.8: Go back to Wuwang Hill to send Big G off

11120.Name: Strange Sights, Stolen Souls
11120.Desc: Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild in Liyue Harbor has a new commission for you. You and Paimon decide to find out what it's all about.

Stages.1: Go to the Liyue Adventurers' Guild and talk to Katheryne
Stages.3: Head to the dock and find the foreman, Uncle Dai
Stages.5: Return to the dock and talk to Uncle Dai
Stages.2: Head to the dock and find the foreman, Uncle Dai

11121.Name: Truth in the Stones
11121.Desc: You arrive at the mine, the scene of the incident, and begin your investigation. A series of clues makes clear that there is nothing ordinary about this disappearance. What is the connection between the mysterious person behind this incident and the missing miners? Where did the missing miners disappear to? You have to know the truth.

Stages.1: Head to the mining site that Uncle Dai mentioned
Stages.5: Report the outcome of your investigation to Uncle Dai

11122.Name: Shifting Earth and Lost Threads Come to Light
11122.Desc: The evidence at the mining site suggests that the miners followed the road north. You follow the trail, gradually closing in on them.

Stages.1: Head to Lingju Pass to investigate
Stages.2: Look for more clues in the area
Stages.7: Follow the road and keep up the pursuit
Stages.11: Head to Nantianmen and look for clues
Stages.12: Take the miner to a nearby camp to rest

11123.Name: Amidst Chaos, the Rock Is Unmoved
11123.Desc: Finally, you reach Nantianmen. A curious ancient tree has quietly stood here throughout the ages, bearing witness to all that has come to pass. To rescue the miners and solve this puzzle once and for all, you proceed to the ancient site that holds all the answers...

Stages.2: Head to the ancient tree and investigate
Stages.6: Enter the Domain at the end of the underground tunnel
Stages.8: Learn the truth of the situation

18000.Name: Bough Keeper: Dainsleif
18000.Desc: Katheryne of the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild seems to have something to tell you.

Stages.5: Go to the second floor of the tavern and wait on the seat by the railing
Stages.7: Go to the first floor of the tavern and find the stranger
Stages.10: Go to the Temple of the Falcon
Stages.11: Enter the Temple of the Falcon
Stages.17: Look for clues related to the Abyss Order in Wolvendom
Stages.14: Leave the Temple of the Falcon

19001.Name: Sister Victoria's Vexation
19001.Desc: Sister Victoria seems to be troubled by something...

Stages.8: Look for the person calling for Barbara

19002.Name: Sudden Shouting
19002.Desc: Someone suddenly starts calling for Barbara in Wolvendom...

19003.Name: The Church's Affairs
19003.Desc: At Barbara's request, you head back to Mondstadt to report to Sister Victoria.

19004.Name: The First Chilibrew Ingredient
19004.Desc: To make some Chilibrew, Barbara has asked you to look for some fresh Jueyun Chilis near the Stone Gate.

Stages.3: Meet Barbara in the Whispering Woods

19005.Name: Knight and Deaconess, Ready for Battle!
19005.Desc: Repel the Treasure Hoarders and rescue the merchant being threatened by them.

Stages.4: Head to the garden near the Adventurers' Guild and wait for Barbara

19006.Name: The Second Chilibrew Ingredient
19006.Desc: To make some Chilibrew, you prepare to go with Barbara to the Whispering Woods to look for some Sweet Flowers.

19008.Name: Healing Is My Job
19008.Desc: To heal Uwe, you accompany Barbara to search the Whispering Woods for Small Lamp Grass.

Stages.1: Look for Fresh Small Lamp Grass
Stages.2: Accompany Barbara while she heals Uwe

19009.Name: A Very Special Beverage
19009.Desc: After helping to clean up the Cathedral, you get ready to meet Barbara at The Cat's Tail.

Stages.1: Look for Barbara around The Cat's Tail

19021.Name: Hard to Track
19021.Desc: As you approach the wharf of Liyue Harbor, an unusually-dressed young man comes up to you, asking after some really strange business...

19022.Name: Distant Gaze
19022.Desc: The young thaumaturge Chongyun has obtained a great amount of (rather unreliable-sounding) information concerning evil spirits. He seems a little dejected when you point this out. As he uses a popsicle to suppress his pure-yang spirit, you both feel someone's gaze on you from the side.

Stages.1: Talk to the child who was looking your way

19023.Name: The Exorcist's Path
19023.Desc: Dalong leaves after having been given half the popsicles, feeling quite pleased. After this small interlude, you and Chongyun continue discussing evil spirits. Chongyun hopes to tap on your abundant experience as an adventurer to adjudge the truth or falsehood of information concerning evil spirits. To that end, you head to Wanwen Bookhouse together.

Stages.1: Go to Wanwen Bookhouse and identify the clues
Stages.2: Go to the heretical ground mentioned in the clues
Stages.4: Proceed onward and search for more clues

19024.Name: Popsicles and Their Curious Uses
19024.Desc: Dalong leaves after having been given all the popsicles, feeling most pleased. For Chongyun, these popsicles are essential to suppressing his pure-yang spirit, and so he must have some on his person at any given time. The two of you head to Wanmin Restaurant to restock.

Stages.2: Talk to Chongyun and decide on your course of action
Stages.1: Go to Wanmin Restaurant to help Chongyun restock on popsicles
Stages.4: Bring the ingredients you prepared back to Chongyun
Stages.6: Bring the ingredients you prepared back to Chongyun
Stages.8: Bring the ingredients you prepared back to Chongyun
Stages.3: Look for Mist Flowers and Qingxin
Stages.7: Look for Jueyun Chili and Slime Condensate

19025.Name: For A Child's Smile
19025.Desc: Chongyun's mind is still on that kid named Dalong even after you've made some more popsicles. The two of you head to Chihu Rock, intending to give the new popsicles to him as well.

Stages.1: Give the newly-made popsicles to Dalong
Stages.8: Talk to Dalong and Little Le
Stages.10: Talk to Dalong and Little Le
Stages.6: Look for the three hidden people

19030.Name: Test of Courage
19030.Desc: The young thaumaturge Chongyun has obtained a great amount of (rather unreliable-sounding) information concerning evil spirits, but you decide not to expose this fact out of courtesy. The way Chongyun sees it, the most likely spot for evil spirits to show up is Wuwang Hill, where a Test of Courage is currently taking place. The test requires two people to go in together, so you accept his invitation and accompany him there...

Stages.1: Go to Wuwang Hill and take part in the Test of Courage
Stages.2: Go to the site of the Test of Courage
Stages.3: Look around for any sign of evil spirits
Stages.4: Look around for any sign of evil spirits
Stages.5: Look around for any sign of evil spirits
Stages.6: Proceed onward and look for information
Stages.7: Proceed onward and look for information

19031.Name: Sudden Discomfort
19031.Desc: You and Chongyun successfully enter the Test of Courage, but as you track the evil spirits, Chongyun suddenly experiences a rush of unstable yang energy and must rest. To prevent his constitution from going out of control, you look for something that might help suppress his pure-yang spirit...

19032.Name: Independent Actions
19032.Desc: Chongyun's pure-yang spirit has finally been brought under control, but he is now aware that the strange goings-on during the Test of Courage are a result of human activity. However, neither of you is ready to give up yet, and at Chongyun's suggestion, you split up and continue to search for traces of the paranormal...

Stages.3: Split up with Chongyun and look for evil spirits

19033.Name: Ever Deeper
19033.Desc: You and Chongyun successfully enter the Test of Courage, and despite causing a misunderstanding, you also gain knowledge of evil spirits. The two of you proceed deeper, equal parts expectant and cautious.

Stages.1: Look for signs of evil spirits alone

19034.Name: The Bottom of Things
19034.Desc: You and Chongyun successfully enter the Test of Courage, but as you track the evil spirits, Chongyun suddenly experiences a rush of unstable yang energy and must rest. But it would be a shame to leave without having found any evil spirits. And so you forge on alone, leaving Chongyun behind to rest.

Stages.1: Look for signs of evil spirits alone

19035.Name: Killjoy
19035.Desc: After a conversation with the Test of Courage staff, you discover that the spooky things happening there are all instigated by humans. While you expected as much, you imagine that Chongyun would be quite disappointed if you told him so...

19041.Name: Adventurous Acquaintance
19041.Desc: You make the acquaintance of a rather passionate adventurer at the front desk of the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild...

Stages.1: Go to the front desk of the Adventurers' Guild

19042.Name: Something... Other Than Adventure?
19042.Desc: You agree to travel with Bennett, but you're doing some things unrelated to adventure this time — for example... running around the city?

Stages.1: Go to With Wind Comes Glory

19043.Name: What Is This, a Day Trip?
19043.Desc: You agree to travel with Bennett, but you're doing some things unrelated to adventure this time — for example... having a stroll in the great outdoors?

19044.Name: Treacherous Thermadon
19044.Desc: You should only go adventuring after making sure that you're fully prepared! You and Bennett prepare some food before you challenge the Deserted Ruins of Thermadon.

Stages.16: Investigate the vicinity and find a way out

19045.Name: Expansive Eya
19045.Desc: An adventurer requires naught but courage and strength. The two of you prepare to head directly to the Deserted Ruins of Eya.

Stages.6: Open the mechanism together with Bennett
Stages.12: Wait for Bennett to unlock the gate mechanism
Stages.13: Solve the puzzle of the mechanism
Stages.21: Help Bennett open the treasure chest

19061.Name: Maid-in-Training
19061.Desc: In accordance with your growing fame as the Honorary Knight, one of your junior Knights of Favonius would like to receive your guidance...

Stages.6: Look for the source of the cry for help.
Stages.8: Go to the crossing and appraise the situation
Stages.10: Report back to Noelle and Alois

19062.Name: The Art of Hospitality
19062.Desc: You and Noelle met a strange guest near Mondstadt named Alois. Alois claims to be a merchant who has lost his cargo due to a monster attack. Noelle decides to bring Alois to Mondstadt to help him find his lost goods...

Stages.8: Go to With Wind Comes Glory
Stages.13: Return to the gate and talk to Noelle

19064.Name: Noelle's Strength
19064.Desc: Noelle, who aims to become a Knight of Favonius, has shared her troubles with you and hopes that you'll be able to help her with her chivalric training. To display the fruits of her daily training to her, Noelle takes you to the Knights' training ground...

Stages.3: Destroy all the training dummies within the time limit

19065.Name: Live Practice
19065.Desc: Noelle has great strength but is never able to use it in real fights. You arrange some training to help her gain more practical combat experience...

Stages.8: Defeat the Eye of the Storm
Stages.11: Head to the nearby hilichurl camp
Stages.1: Look for slimes in Mondstadt's outskirts
Stages.4: Look for the next training target
Stages.7: Look for the next training target
Stages.2: Look for slimes in Mondstadt's outskirts

19066.Name: Strength Training
19066.Desc: Noelle has great strength, but the path to greater strength is never-ending. Your suggestion to help her bring out yet more power is... mining.

Stages.7: Talk to the Knight of Favonius next to the rockfall
Stages.8: Talk to the Knight of Favonius next to the rockfall
Stages.3: Shatter the nearby metal ore deposits

19067.Name: Fleeting Leisure
19067.Desc: Noelle, who aims to become a Knight of Favonius, has shared her troubles with you and hopes that you'll be able to help her with her chivalric training. To get the workaholic Noelle some rest, you suggest that the two of you have some tea and let loose a little...

Stages.1: Go to Good Hunter and take a little break

19068.Name: Gift and Intent
19068.Desc: Noelle has, as is her wont, extended a helping hand to Bea, who is facing a bit of a romantic quandary. After some discussion, you decide to use a gift to help Bea get her feelings across...

Stages.1: Make a serving of Mondstadt Grilled Fish
Stages.2: Give a serving of Mondstadt Grilled Fish to Bea
Stages.3: Give a serving of Mondstadt Grilled Fish to Bea
Stages.4: Give a serving of Mondstadt Grilled Fish to Bea
Stages.9: Look for Noelle in the library

19069.Name: Gift and Intent
19069.Desc: Noelle has, as is her wont, extended a helping hand to Bea, who is facing a bit of a romantic quandary. After some discussion, you decide to use a gift to help Bea get her feelings across...

Stages.2: Give the Handpicked Gift to Bea
Stages.4: Take a picture of the view of Falcon Coast from Cape Oath
Stages.7: Take a picture of the top of Starsnatch Cliff at night (19:00 – 24:00)
Stages.9: Take a picture at Windrise that captures the river and shade of the trees

19081.Name: Studious Maid
19081.Desc: Noelle is usually brimming with energy, but recently she has been cooped up in the library, worrying about something or other...

Stages.1: Go to the library and find Noelle

19082.Name: Journey to Liyue
19082.Desc: Noelle reveals to you that she is very anxious about the Knights of Favonius selection exam. At your suggestion, she decides to join you on a trip to Liyue to relieve her stress...

19083.Name: While the Millelith Stands Guard
19083.Desc: Noelle is mistaken for a Knight of Favonius several times over the course of the trip. After things have calmed down a little, you decide to see what Noelle could learn from the Millelith down by the harbor.

Stages.5: Head to the location to stand guard
Stages.7: Stop the Treasure Hoarders from escaping
Stages.9: Head to the place Noelle wants to go

19084.Name: A Knight's Journey Through Liyue
19084.Desc: Noelle is mistaken for a Knight of Favonius several times over the course of the trip. After things have calmed down a little, you decide to stop by Third-Round Knockout and take a short break.

Stages.9: Give a Chaos Device to Iron Tongue Tian
Stages.11: Return to Third-Round Knockout and listen to the story
Stages.12: Return to Third-Round Knockout and listen to the story
Stages.3: Head to the hilichurl camp in the city's outskirts
Stages.5: Help Iron Tongue Tian gather inspiration

19085.Name: Adventurer's Entrance Exam
19085.Desc: Noelle reveals to you that she is very anxious about the Knights of Favonius selection exam. At your suggestion, the two of you head to the Adventurers' Guild, hoping to get some extra exam experience.

Stages.1: Go to the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild and find Katheryne
Stages.2: Go to the Angel's Share and find Cyrus

19086.Name: Adventurer's Entrance Exam
19086.Desc: After fully understanding Noelle's reasons for seeking him out, an elated and excited Cyrus decides to put you both through his new exam at the highest difficulty level.

Stages.2: Give Cyrus a dish that meets his requirements

19087.Name: Adventurer's Entrance Exam
19087.Desc: After fully understanding Noelle's reasons for seeking him out, an elated and excited Cyrus decides to put you both through his new exam at the highest difficulty level.

Stages.14: Return to the library and find Noelle

19090.Name: Noelle Rides Out
19090.Desc: Noelle reveals to you that she is very anxious about the Knights of Favonius selection exam. At your suggestion, she decides to emulate the knights she knows in an attempt to overcome her sense of unease.

Stages.4: Head to the hilichurl camp and place the Baron Bunny
Stages.1: Go to the Stormbearer Mountains and gather fresh Valberries
Stages.2: Defeat the Pyro Slimes and gather Slime Condensate

19091.Name: Substitute Acting Grand Master Noelle
19091.Desc: Noelle decides to emulate Jean by returning to Mondstadt and helping the citizens with their problems.

Stages.3: Head northwest from With Wind Comes Glory and search for clues
Stages.4: Climb onto the rooftop and look for a Finch nest
Stages.5: Climb onto the rooftop and look for a Finch nest
Stages.6: Climb onto the rooftop and look for a Finch nest

19092.Name: Noelle the Intelligence Operative
19092.Desc: Noelle decides to emulate Kaeya by heading to the Angel's Share and attempting to gather intel on any threats to Mondstadt's security.

Stages.2: Serve the Death After Noon to Payne
Stages.17: Go to the second floor and clear the tables
Stages.1: Go to Angel's Share and gather intel

19101.Name: The Cat's Tail's Bartender
19101.Desc: They say that there's a popular bartender at The Cat's Tail.

19102.Name: To Catch a Kitten
19102.Desc: Searching for three kitties in Mondstadt might not be the easiest thing in the world...

Stages.6: Search for the kitty on Mondstadt's rooftops
Stages.7: Try to make conversation with Roger
Stages.8: Look for the kitty near the Blacksmith
Stages.9: Try to make conversation with Nelson
Stages.10: Look for the kitty near the Cathedral
Stages.11: Try to make conversation with Paisley

19103.Name: A Special Base Drink
19103.Desc: Diona would like to go to Dadaupa Gorge to secure a certain special "base drink."

Stages.3: Talk to the person at the gorge's entrance

19104.Name: The Shadow Over Dadaupa
19104.Desc: Getting deep into Dadaupa Gorge might require a cunning plan...

Stages.3: Avoid the monsters and head deeper into Dadaupa Gorge
Stages.4: Avoid the monsters and continue deeper into Dadaupa Gorge
Stages.5: Avoid the monsters and continue deeper into Dadaupa Gorge
Stages.6: Avoid the monsters and continue deeper into Dadaupa Gorge

19105.Name: Samachurl Herbal Soup
19105.Desc: According to Diona, the herbal soup made by samachurls can possibly be used to make an antidote to alcohol.

19106.Name: Special Cocktailing Condiments
19106.Desc: Diona wants to look for some special flavoring for her cocktail.

Stages.4: Give the Fresh Fish to Diona
Stages.7: Give the Fresh Slime Condensate to Diona

19107.Name: Exchanging Pointers
19107.Desc: In order to learn the tricks of a professional mixologist, Diona decides to exchange pointers with Connor.

Stages.1: Go to Dawn Winery and meet Diona

20068.Name: Sorry, Timmie!
20068.Desc: Timmie seems to have a bone to pick with you over some matter. Perhaps Sister Grace might know a way to help resolve things between you two...

20069.Name: Floral Fresh
20069.Desc: Flowers don't stay fresh for long. Flora, the owner of the Floral Whisper, has been thinking of ways to preserve them better...

Stages.2: Head to Dragonspine's Statue of The Seven and place a package there
Stages.6: Place a package near the mountain cave
Stages.3: Head to Dragonspine and place a package beside a body of water
Stages.4: Head to the mountain cavern on Dragonspine and place a package there

20070.Name: Fresh Flora
20070.Desc: To help Flora ascertain the effectiveness of putting plants in cold storage, you must head to Dragonspine once again to retrieve the flowers buried in the snow...

Stages.6: Retrieve the package near the cavern
Stages.11: Give the retrieved packages to Flora

41311.Name: The Origin of the Lanterns
41311.Desc: On the day of the first full moon each year, the people of Liyue celebrate Lantern Rite. At nighttime, everyone in Liyue releases Xiao Lanterns and the Mingxiao Lantern into the bright night sky. Each Xiao Lantern contains a piece of Plaustrite that makes it float, and people hang wish sticks from them, which carry their hearts' desires in written or painted form. The lanterns slowly fly away, carrying the hope that the light they emit might guide the souls of Liyue's faithful protectors home, that they might return and be reunited with their people once more. You and Paimon arrive in Liyue as the festival is in full swing, preparing to enjoy yourselves...

41312.Name: Currents Deep Beneath the Lanterns
41312.Desc: The highlight of Lantern Rite is the release of the giant Mingxiao Lantern into the sky, and this year's Mingxiao Lantern is supposed to be a sight well worth the wait. The Plaustrite that will lift the lantern into the air is the largest in twenty years! For this special occasion, the merchants of Liyue have set up the Xiao Market to help gather the materials needed to build the lantern. When you arrive at the Xiao Market, one of the event organizers, Wang'ya, seems to have something to say to you...
